name: Galactic Duel
description:
The use of controller is highly recommended.

Objective

Each player will select a pilot from the pilot screen.

Every pilot has different stats and abilities.

Destroy your rival three times in the same game to win.

Original Music Help the Development

By now, Galactic Duel is a game in development seeking for new pilots, new mechanics, original game modes and lifting up to 4 players.

At the moment only 2 players mode is available.

To help the development, follow Charlie Bluewood: @charliebluewood

Contact for suggestions or bug report:

charliebluewood@gmail.com
